info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 18 at 7:51PM CDT until June 18 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee/Sullivan WI
info.description:
Flooding on area roadways and in low-lying areas continues to impacts southeastern Rock County and southwestern Walworth County through the remainder of the evening. This areal flood warning will replace the previous flash flood warnings.
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring.
* WHERE...Portions of south central and southeast Wisconsin, including the following counties, in south central Wisconsin, Rock. In southeast Wisconsin, Walworth.
* WHEN...Until 1030 PM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. Expect many areas of slow moving or standing water.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 750 PM CDT, local law enforcement reported flooding in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. Between 3 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Elkhorn, Delavan, Williams Bay, Walworth, Clinton, Fontana- On-Geneva Lake, Sharon, Darien, Como, Allens Grove, Delavan Lake, Avalon and Foxhollow. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT THIS EVENING
